Articles.Content: 5337: there is another lobby.

5338: VACANCY, you wonder why you began climbing the tower in the first place, and how you don't remember how tall it was when looking at it from the exterior.

Edited September 15, 2020 by Dirkidirk
5339: i want my refund back.
5340: EA headquarters is there, $5 to continue.

5341: You pay $5 on the previous floor.
On the next floor, there is a maze. There is a door that leads straight to the end from the start, but you need to pay $5 to go through, and you're out of money.
5342: Elevator designed to reach all floors. Problem is, it has this stinky man in there. So you may want to just take the stairs
5343: Buzz Lightyear is founded in there,and so,you blowed him into pieces,in order to advance the next floor!

5344: Its a warehouse full of TVs with no HDMI out, and no compost video out; this is where those hotel TVs come from.

Edited September 15, 2020 by The_Arcitect
5345: another SM-65 Atlas is found in there,not only one,there's too many of them in here.
nwod edispu dna sdrawkcab yletelpmoc si moor sihT:6435
5347: apparently,this is HarvesteR's Working Room,and it seems that he's visiting the KSP forums,again,but with a diferent Account.
5348: HOOOOOOOOOOOOOOMEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEER MAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD.

5349: the user above me is ctrl+v his text over and over.
5350: Make way for the spaceship!
5351: a TF2 Engineer is found in there,and angrier.
2352: Make way for the airplane
5353: A Borrowed Soyuz MS10 is in there,luckily,it's small,so you just pass below it.
2353: A NFL stadium real size is the whole floor. You don't know how floors 2354 and 2352 are complaining about the noise.
2354: This is where the janitors live, they are complaining about the noise over them.
2354: This is where they test jet engines.
2355: The overloading complaints in paper from floors 2353-2354 (for some reason there is two 2354s?) take up a whole floor
2356: there's a paper news from the USSR that says that a GLV can't reach into orbit,by Sergei Korolev..
2357: The quiet room... SHHHHHH!!!!!
